resource: 1003171.vtc=true 1003171.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1003171.1002622.description=Seatbelt warning buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelts reminder sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds. 1003171.description=Seatbelt warning buzzer:The driver’s and front passenger’s seatbelts reminder sounds to alert the driver and front passenger that his or her seatbelt is not fastened. The buzzer sounds intermittently for 10 seconds after the vehicle has reached a speed of at least 12 mph (20 km/h). Then, if the seatbelt is still unfastened, the buzzer will sound in a different tone for 20 more seconds.
